item.title:
R to @emilianobonassi: https://gist.github.com/emilianobonassi/deb7e6ae882f43d3bcbe6a462a794bf0
The idea:
1. create/sign the tx locally 2. see the effect on a local trusted fork and validate 3. send it
Possible with Helios (light client) which "converts an untrusted centralized RPC endpoint into a safe unmanipulable local RPC for its users"
